revised_title: Geodesics and Pre-Geodesics in Transverse, Type Changing Pseudo Riemannian Metrics
tldr: The authors study geodesics and pre-geodesics in smooth manifolds with pseudo Riemannian metrics that change bilinear type on a hypersurface. They classify geodesics and pre-geodesics that cross the hypersurface transversely and apply these results to the eikonal partial differential equation, finding geometric conditions for the local existence or nonexistence of smooth, transverse solutions.
